class_notes: Counts as Cat C for Music Majors. This course used to be listed as MUS 370W.
course_description: This course investigates musical languages from musical cultures around the globe. Students will cultivate analytical listening skills to understand how musical elements form musical language. They will explore the cultural meanings embedded in music through various cultural contexts.
sections: Class Nbr: 4486, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: M. Ishiguro, Status: Open
